title: pelimies
author: pelimies
content: Dubai UAE, ChartAI —Month 10, 2023—ChartAI today announced it has joined NVIDIA Inception, a program that nurtures startups revolutionizing industries with technological advancements.ChartAI is focused on revolutionizing cryptocurrency insights through instant charting on Telegram. ChartAI plans to use the resources available through NVIDIA Inception, including access to technical training, preferred pricing on NVIDIA hardware/software, free cloud credits,  technology assistance and investments to drive their business forward. The program will also offer ChartAI the opportunity to collaborate with industry-leading experts and other AI-driven organizations.Founder Daniel (0ver) said “We applied to join Nvidia’s prestigious Inception Program a short while ago after seeing our partners PaalAI had already joined. We were very fortunate to be accepted given our early stages of development but are very glad to see Nvidia also see the potential and superb vision of our team & product. We look forward to utilizing Nvidia’s endless tools and connections to further push ChartAI into the limelight and develop the commercial side of our business”.NVIDIA Inception helps startups during critical stages of product development, prototyping and deployment. Every NVIDIA Inception member gets a custom set of ongoing benefits, such as NVIDIA Deep Learning Institute credits, preferred pricing on NVIDIA hardware and software, and technology assistance, which provides startups with the fundamental tools to help them grow.https:ChartAI.tech/
